document.full_text: andrea petkovic pulled off another upset at the sony ericsson open on tuesday, defeating sixth seed jelena jankovic to reach the semi-finals, while kim clijsters needed all her big-match experience just to stay in the tournament.
document.title: andrea petkovic upsets jelena jankovic
lines_and_colors: andrea petkovic pulled off another upset at the sony ericsson open on tuesday, defeating sixth seed jelena jankovic to reach the semi-finals, while kim clijsters needed all her big-match experience just to stay in the tournament.
